text: Linus Obexer (born 5 June 1997) is a Swiss footballer who currently plays as a left back for Swiss club FC Lugano on loan from BSC Young Boys. ==Club career== Obexer is a youth product from BSC Young Boys. He made his Swiss Super League debut on 12 May 2016 against FC St. Gallen ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Switzerland youth international footballers Category:BSC Young Boys players Category:Neuchâtel Xamax FCS players Category:FC Aarau players Category:FC Lugano players Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Swiss Challenge League players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Sportspeople from Bern
title: Linus Obexer
